New Records: Both teams scored 137 runs in their respective innings, leading to a tied game and a Super Over

Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka won the toss and decided to bowl first
Rain delay affected the match proceedings
Suryakumar Yadav emphasized the team's approach to the game

The series victory boosted India's confidence

Impact of weather on the game's outcome
